caseTitle: Maulana Abdul Haque Baloch & others v. Government of Balochistan thr. Secy. Industries & Mineral Development & others
tagline: The Chaghi Hills Exploration Joint Venture Agreement for exploring copper and gold reserves in Reko Diq area of the province of Balochistan between Balochistan Development Authority and respondent-company, with percentage interest as respondent-company entitled to 75% interest and the Provincial Government given 25% "free carried interest up to discovery", was entered into for an inadequate consideration as regards the percentage interest of the Provincial Government and is held to be void and unenforceable.
